scripts.build: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.script.json node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register scripts/build.ts
scripts.start: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.script.json INSPECT_CHROME=9222 node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register scripts/start.ts
scripts.start:debug: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.script.json INSPECT_CHROME=9222 node --inspect-brk=9588 -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register scripts/start.ts
scripts.validate-wcag-contrast: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.script.json node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register scripts/validate-wcag-contrast.tsx
